meanings.def: bright yellow in colour like gold
examples: Bake for ten minutes until the pastry is crisp and golden.
The walls gleamed golden in the light of the setting sun.
The whole sky turned golden and red.
Businesses have a golden opportunity to expand into new markets.
Half-way throught the game, the striker missed a golden opportunity.
I realized that this was my golden opportunity to say what I thought.
This will be a golden opportunity for you to meet your pop idols.

meanings.def: to be in a situation where you are successful or do not have any problems
examples: He thinks once he gets the money he'll be golden.
If it works this time, we’re golden.

meanings.def: a course of action that is not extreme
to destroy something that would make you rich, successful, etc.
it is often best not to say anything
